com.manaldush.telnet

Interface IClientSession


  • public interface IClientSession
    Describe session object and its capabilities. Session contain all information about processing context. Created by Maxim.Melnikov on 22.06.2017.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Command for close session.
